(Simplified: 瘗)
Chinese Definition:
①掩埋，埋葬：瘞埋。瘞藏(cáng)(殉葬的金玉器物)。瘞玉埋香(舊指美女死去)。

瘞字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yì］
［《廣韻》於罽切，去祭，影。］
“瘗1”的繁体字。
(1)埋物祭地。
(2)埋葬。
(3)坟墓。
(4)埋藏；隐藏。

瘞字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【疒字部】　瘞； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页778第02
〔古文〕?【唐韻】於罽切【集韻】壹計切，?音䚷。【說文】幽薶也。【爾雅·釋言】瘞，幽也。【疏】謂埋藏。又【釋祭名】祭地曰瘞薶。【註】旣祭埋藏之。【詩·大雅】上下奠瘞。【釋文】瘞，埋也。【禮·禮運】故先王秉著龜，列祭祀瘞繒。【註】埋牲曰瘞。　又【儀禮·覲禮】祭川沈，祭地瘞。【註】古文瘞作殪。祭地瘞者，祭月也。　又【爾雅·釋詁】瘞，微也。　又【集韻】壹計切，医去聲。義同。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yì］
["Guangyun" Yu Fengqie, go to sacrifice, shadow. ]
"瘗1" in traditional characters.
(1) Buried objects and sacrifice sites.
(2) Burial.
(3) Tomb.
(4) Buried; hidden.
bury
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Lunch Concentration】【The Department of Sui Characters】　瘗; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 778 No. 02
[Ancient text]? [Tang Yun] Yu Fengqie [Jiyun] One plan cut,? The sound is lost. [Said the text] Youxie also. [Erya·Interpretation] Difficulty, quiet. 【Sparse】It means buried. Also [Shi Ji name] Sacrifice to the land is called 無薶. [Note] Hidden sacrifices. [Poetry·Daya] Laying up and down. 【Explanation】Epilepsy, buried. 【Ritual·Ritual Luck】So the first king held the tortoise and made sacrifices to the sacred rites. [Note] Burying the sacrifices is called diarrhea.　[Rituals·Greetings] Sacrifice to the Sichuan Basin and the earth. [Note] The ancient text is impoverished. Sacrifice to the crippled, sacrifice to the moon.　[Erya·Shi Xie] 瘗, Wei Ye.　[Jiyun] One plan to cut, the sound of medical treatment. The same meaning.
